comments.body:
https://gist.github.com/konard/114ca9b84f7a63714d512e04f5c030e3 - looking at latest log of 0.8.6 version execution, I don't see any raw command in the log, it must be included for better user experience in bug reporting.

And it should be in the beginning of the log. So we should know exactly how our solve or ./solve.mjs was called in the log (it should also go to terminal/console).

title: Log should always include raw executed so the user only needs to upload log to gist and give a link
